Package IVE_Editor.PlugIns

Classes which enable mounting plug-ins (both components and moduls) into the editor and enables the comunication between them.

PluginsServices This class collect all services from all plug-ins and offers them to another plug-ing which can use them.
Service  
 

Package IVE_Editor.PlugIns Description

Classes which enable mounting plug-ins (both components and moduls) into the editor and enables the comunication between them. These classes can be consider as core classes too. The core classes are also in package IVE_Editor.
